member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the specific reduction algorithm to use for the DirectML reduce operator (as described by the structure).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_ARGMAX
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the indices of the max elements of the input tensor's elements along the specified axis, int32 {i j k ..} = maxindex(X Y Z …).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_ARGMIN
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the indices of the min elements of the input tensor's elements along the specified axis, int32 {i j k ..} = minindex(X Y Z …).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_AVERAGE
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the mean of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = (x1 + x2 + ... + xn) / n.

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_L1
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the L1 norm of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = |x1| + |x2| + ... + |xn|.

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_L2
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the L2 norm of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = sqrt(x1^2 + x2^2 + ... + xn^2).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_LOG_SUM
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the log sum of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = log(x1 + x2 + ... + xn).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_LOG_SUM_EXP
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the log sum exponent of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = log(exp(x1) + exp(x2) + ... + exp(xn)).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_MAX
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the max of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = max(max(max(x1, x2), x3), ..., xn).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_MIN
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the min of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = min(min(min(x1, x2), x3), ..., xn).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_MULTIPLY
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the product of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = (x1 * x2 * ... * xn).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_SUM
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the sum of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = (x1 + x2 + ... + xn).

member.name: DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION.DML_REDUCE_FUNCTION_SUM_SQUARE
member.summary: Indicates a reduction function that computes the sum square of the input tensor's elements along the specified axes, x = x1^2 + x2^2 + ... + xn^2.
